findings.title: A.1 Negligence for Users With Tokens Less Than Exchange Minimum Value
findings.description: The contract neglects users with tokens less than exchange minimum value, resulting in no VegasONE token being sent to the user.

findings.title: A.2 Centralization Power of the Admin
